br.com.gamemods.j2nwc

Class WorldConverter

  • br.com.gamemods.j2nwc.WorldConverter

  • public class WorldConverter

    Prepare a conversion from a Java World 1.14+ to Nukkit.

    Please check this page for details about the requirements and expectations.

    See Also:
    this page

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WorldConverter(java.io.File from, java.io.File to)
      Prepare a conversion from a Java World 1.14+ to Nukkit.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void convert()
      Executes the conversion in the current thread. Will take a while to complete.

                      java.io.File from,

        Prepare a conversion from a Java World 1.14+ to Nukkit.

        Please check this page for details about the requirements and expectations.

        Parameters:
        from - The Java world folder
        to - The world folder that will be created for the Nukkit's world

      • getSkipSkinHeads

        public boolean getSkipSkinHeads()

        Determines if player heads which contains custom skins should be skipped.

        Player heads without skins are unaffected.

      • setSkipSkinHeads

        public void setSkipSkinHeads(boolean p)

        Determines if player heads which contains custom skins should be skipped.

        Player heads without skins are unaffected.
